name: IMG Dead Simple Contact Form
author: Phil Thompson

sections.description:
Just a simple contact form – for when those bulky forms are too much.

Contact form collects:

  • Full name
  • Email
  • Telephone (optional)
  • Message

and emails it to your specified email address and that’s it

No CSS – that’s up to you!

No management of which form fields to show (except telephone number)
sections.installation:
1. Upload the img-dead-simple-contact-form folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the IMG Dead Simple Contact Form plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter the shortcode [dscf] on any page you want the contact form to display
sections.changelog:
0.95

  • Bug fixed where hidden form field was incorrectly printed out with php tags. Oops!

0.94

  • Bug fixed where email address was always marked as invalid

0.93

  • (Basic) Feedback added when updating settings in admin area
  • Bug fixed where telephone field didn’t display even when selected to show

0.92

  • Missing ‘get_parameter’ method added

0.91

  • Critical bug fixed
  • Read me tweaked

0.9

  • Launched
